about.title: WHO WE ARE?
about.subtitle: Your Transformation Coach
about.name: Luis Rond贸n
about.intro: Black Lion Empire, created by Luis Rond贸n, Personal Trainer, nutritionist and former professional soccer player, is a physical and mental transformation movement.
about.description: We create personalized training and nutrition programs, 100% online, to help you build your best version from anywhere in the world.

trajectory.p1: From a young age I found my passion in sports. In 2016 I began my career as a professional soccer player, dedicating my life to high performance and the discipline required to compete at the highest level. During those years, I not only trained to improve on the field, but also became deeply interested in how the body works, the science of training and sports nutrition.
trajectory.p2: While playing, I dedicated myself to studying physiology, bodybuilding, performance and nutrition. That curiosity became a vocation: understanding how to transform the body and mind through conscious training.
trajectory.p3: After my retirement from professional soccer in 2020, I decided to follow my true passion: helping others reach their best version. I became certified as a Personal Trainer and Sports Nutrition Advisor, combining my experience as an athlete with the technical and scientific knowledge of fitness.
trajectory.p4: Today my goal is to guide you to achieve real, sustainable change based on discipline, knowledge and commitment to yourself. My approach is not only to transform bodies, but also mindsets, creating habits that lead you to live with more energy, confidence and balance.

about.mission: Empower people from all over the world to reach their maximum physical and mental potential, building not only a strong body, but a champion mindset.
